Being born in the midst of the holy Dharma, with a noble and distinguished lineage.

Fourth, the dedication reaching everywhere.

They also vow to seek the inexhaustible merits and virtues of the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

Sixth, the dedication of following all firm roots of goodness.
The good roots of giving and so forth that one has cultivated are directed towards something.
For the buddhas to protect and be able to accomplish all firm roots of goodness, firm vows, and so forth.
It is called the dedication of following all firm roots of goodness.
Seventh, the dedication of impartial mind following all beings.
Bodhisattvas increase all roots of goodness and use them to equally benefit all beings.
It is called the dedication of impartial mind following beings.
Eighth, the dedication of suchness.

Moreover, the mind of dedication of bodhisattvas arises based on the various gates of suchness.
Therefore, it is also called the dedication of the nature of suchness.
